column5: Good one Dave. I too am proud to say I know you.
Great example Dave.  Kudos is right!  Thanks Spiel.
You and Harvey both deserve kudos!!!

My good buddy Fish Farmer has been selflessly donating his time and boat for many years now to help our mutual friend Harvey from the Golden Horsehoe Club along with the good folks at the Straitline Anglers to take kids out on Lake O fishing.  While he never makes any posts here about it I thought I would.  Kudos to Dave (first picture holding the Coke) and all involved!
I'll bet they will never forget being on the water and catching those fish!!  Great stuff!
What a great post.  Way to go Dave, and, thanks for sharing this with us Spiel
awesome !!! thats a great thing to have for the kids you are a hero to them !!
Yup, you said it Chris, he's a super guy.  Way to go Dave!!!!
Just plain ol' awesome. Good on ya!
For he's a jolly good.... you know the rest.
Nicely done Dave!!!
Great story Chris.Warms my heart. No doubt about it, FF is a great guy. This whole community blows me away with the amount of generosity and benevolance here.  Hats off to you!!!

Thanks Chris and everyone for the kind words, I don't know what to say. It comes a time in life that it's good to give back to people that may not be so fortunate to go fishing and other. I had a father that did all for me. I guess it's a way to say thanks dad. If you know Harvey, he gives all to kids and if I can help him, I'm all in.
Class act! Bet the kids loved it.  Thanks for sharing Chris.
Good on ya sir!  The smiles say it all.
Well done Dave may the karma return two fold.   Art

I know you and all those involved Dave would never seek any applause for what you do but I wanted to let you and every one else here know what a great guy you are.  I'm truly blessed to call you friend, you're awesome!
Yup, that's Dave alright, nothing ever shows. Hats off to you my friend.
Sweet nice job FF!!!
Never met a fella from da ROCK,that wouldnt help anyone or any cause. Well done Dave and to those all involved.
For all of us that dont know you personally...give yourself a well deserved pat on the back because there isnt an icon for that
Very worthwhile, good for you FF.
It is so nice to read posts like the above proving that there still are kind, generous and caring people in our society. Thanks for raising my spirits!
There's never been any doubt in my mind that Dave is a stand up guy. Once in a while some recognition is a good thing. So, way to go Dave!! And thanks Chris for mentioning this.
Thanks very much guys.    Chris, I owe you one buddy.   I'm know their is a lot of OFC people hear that do a lot. I'm just one spoke in the OFC wheel.
certainly was a great event by all accounts big thanks to all the boat captains who donated, their time, fuel & equipment to this great cause!
That's what you would call a ghost story FARM REPORT.....
Thanks for posting Chris, and thanx for been a mentor to the kids Dave, and coke is better then pepsi, you have the right can in your hand
